posts.post_content:
I missed the orange border that sold on eBay in October. If the winner is a Net54 member, PM me; I’m happy to pay a premium. I’m also looking for a red border example to go with this:

[url=https://ibb.co/M2gQk5P][img]https://i.ibb.co/C1wDKsV/user70-pic36758-1697657017.jpg[/img][/url]

Thanks in advance!

Thanks to a kind board member who saw my post, I now have the orange border! :) I’m still on the lookout for a Red Border to complete my Munsell run. Feel free to reach out, and I’d be happy to make an offer.
